name: Dust Bunnies (Dev from Another Place)
description:
Dust Bunnies is your usual First-Person Sweeper game. Your air purifier needs a new filter, everything is filled with dust and there are dust bunnies everywhere. Time to sweep up this mess!

Created during the 2018 #7DFPS Game Jam

Code & stuff:  @DevFrmNothaPlce

Credits:
